attributes.background: He clearly deserves one ahead of some past recipients; he's one of the best athletes ever. It's quite shameful that he doesn't already have one after all of the achievements he amassed during his career.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
